main event: A UFO was sighted in Malvern, Pennsylvania on May 20, 1955, emitting intermittent bright light and traveling at high speeds, eventually disappearing in the sky.
interesting points: The UFO was observed at a speed estimated to be over 5,000 miles per hour.
The light emitted flashes and a thunder-like sound was heard during the observation.
The object diminished in intensity and finally disappeared during its flight path.
The sighting was made by CDR W. H. Hillands, a Naval aviator with twenty years of experience.
The report indicates the possibility of the object being an accidental aerial crossing with flashing lights.
sighted object: intermittent bright light traveling at high speed
